May 20, 1907 D Llandovery Contest (Class A)
Llandovery Contest (Class A) 20 Test Piece Contest Llandovery Contest llandovery-contest-class-a
Il Trovatore [unknown arranger]
Llandovery, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK 1st prize £12, 2nd prize £6, 3rd prize £3. 4 bands competed.
March 21, 2012, 4:29 p.m. Sept. 18, 2018, 8:36 a.m.
